item.title: Mobile Blockchain - The Holy Grail
item.description: The Holy Grail Mobile blockchain is the crypto Holy Grail. If we’re creating a global decentralized network of millions of users, we’ll want it to run on the simplest devices possible. But this has often been dismissed as too difficult, so developers either treat smartphone support as a long-term goal (which they never get to), completely neuter the capabilities of their mobile nodes, or ignore them entirely. But thatâ€™s completely the wrong approach.
